I'm an entrepreneur from Boston where I have been working on Pitch for Windows. In May, I graduated from Boston University's College of Engineering.

 

Hello,

I'm Robins (or Ravi), an engineer and entreprenuer from Boston. I recently graduated from Boston University's College of Engineering where I earned a Bachelor of Science in Computer Engineering.

I'm a cofounder at Pitch where I did product, UI, and UX and helped drive it to become a 2013 Microsoft ImagineCup finalist. It's going to be released in the Windows Store soon.

Feel free to write to me or get in touch via any other method.

about this site

This site's engine is Jekyll. The design is a custom implmentation of Skeleton with a bit of Bootstrap and is available on Github. Icons are from Fontawesome. Fonts from Google1. Some javascript is used for effects2 . The logo effect is done by Airport.
The site is hosted on Azure and analytics are done by Google.


1 If you're using Windows, you may see Segoe being used instead of Lato. I find Segoe really beautiful, espeically on high DPI displays.

2 Some parts of the site may be a bit buggy on some devices. I may have it already marked, but if you find something, it would be great if you could fill an issue on Github.
